Lab Title: Create users/groups and assign roles via CLI
Primary CLI Commands: az ad user, az ad group, az role assignment
az group, az vm create, az tag
az network vnet, az network nsg, az network nsg rule
az storage account, az storage container, azcopy
az webapp, az webapp deployment slot

Lab Title: Create LB with backend pool + probe
Primary CLI Commands: az network lb, az network lb address-pool, az network lb probe

Lab Title: Create alert + action group via CLI
Primary CLI Commands: az monitor metrics alert, az monitor action-group
az backup vault, az backup protection
